No Boisterous Noise and Confusion.--Come to the table without levity. Boisterous noise and contention should not be allowed any day of the week; but on the Sabbath all should observe quietness. No loud-toned commands should be heard at any time; but on the Sabbath it is entirely out of place. This is God's holy day, the day He has set apart to 
                                                                           258
commemorate His creative works, a day He has sanctified and hallowed.--Manuscript 57, 1897.
